response.overview: An incomplete film was made by the Bournemouth Science Fiction & Fantasy Group.  It was filmed on VHS between 1986 and 1991 with some editing done in 2000 and 2009.  The complete cut runs for 55 minutes and represents about two thirds of the complete film, with missing material described in intertitles and consists of half the story and its ending.
response.title: Blue Star Red Sand
